outline.title: 拼豆像素化工具
outline.summary: 將您的創意轉換為精美的拼豆設計 - 應用標題頁，展示核心價值主張
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/icon.png - Image 1 is a professional-looking app icon made of colorful beads forming the letter 'B' (or a stylized pixel shape), which is perfect for a title slide about a bead pixelation tool.

outline.title: 為什麼需要拼豆像素化工具？
outline.summary: 拼豆手工藝愛好者面臨的挑戰與市場機會，展示傳統方法的痛點和解決方案
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/slide2_problem.png - Image 2 clearly illustrates the problem (manual, time-consuming process of converting images to bead designs) and the opportunity, directly matching the slide content.

outline.title: 三大核心功能
outline.summary: 概覽圖片像素化、拼豆預覽和材料統計三大核心功能

outline.title: 靈活的像素化控制
outline.summary: 展示圖片像素化功能，支援多種格式和可調像素大小
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/slide4_pixelate.png - Image 3 visually demonstrates the process of image pixelation and the effect of changing pixel size (1px to 100px), which aligns perfectly with the slide's focus on flexible pixelation control.

outline.title: 看到真實的拼豆效果
outline.summary: 展示拼豆預覽功能的核心價值 - 圓形拼豆渲染和顏色還原，讓用戶在購買材料前確認最終效果。包含拼豆預覽功能的演示圖片和核心特點說明。
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/slide5_preview.png - 展示原圖、像素化版本和拼豆預覽的三段對比圖

outline.title: 拼豆預覽的實際應用
outline.summary: 介紹拼豆預覽功能的實際應用場景和優勢 - 如何通過預覽確認設計、下載預覽圖進行分享、以及設計驗證的重要性。強調該功能如何幫助用戶在製作前做出更好的設計決策。

outline.title: 自訂顏色集管理
outline.summary: 自訂顏色集功能，智能色彩匹配和顏色集管理
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/slide6_colorset.png - Image 5 illustrates "Custom Color Set Management" by showing a list of colors/codes being matched to a pixelated design, directly supporting the slide's content about matching material libraries.

outline.title: 精確的材料統計
outline.summary: 材料統計功能展示，自動統計顏色和數量
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/slide7_statistics.png - Image 6 is a "Statistics Dashboard" showing total beads, color varieties, a table of color codes/quantities, and a pie chart, which perfectly represents the material statistics function.

outline.title: 簡單四步工作流
outline.summary: 展示從上傳圖片到下載使用的完整工作流程
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/pixelator_app/assets/slide8_workflow.png - Image 7 shows a clear 4-step workflow (Upload, Adjust Parameters, Generate Preview, Download Results), which matches the slide's content on the simple four-step process.

outline.title: 專業級技術優勢
outline.summary: 本地運行、高效處理、精準匹配、用戶友好的技術特點

outline.title: 立即開始
outline.summary: 呼籲用戶下載應用、安裝運行、開始設計的行動頁面
